text: Imagine a vibrant green frog with a friendly appearance wearing gleaming blue swimming goggles. This amusing creature is situated in an unexpected human-like scenario. It's sitting at a wooden desk, an open book in front of it and a pen in one of its webbed hands. The frog appears to be studying intensively, trying to make sense of the complex diagrams in the book with its goggles shifted up to its forehead. The environment is a cozy study room with a table lamp illuminating the scene
